languages.text: "Это... прекрасно. Пустота таит в себе удивительные пылкие образы, которые я и не могла представить. Всего один красочный мир, кровоточащий огнем, но так много пищи для размышлений".
"It's... beautiful. There are ardent views in the void the likes of which I could never have imagined. A single vivid world bleeding flames, yet so much substance for my thoughts."
languages.original_text: "Это... прекрасно. Пустота таит в себе удивительные пылкие образы, которые я и не могла представить. Всего один красочный мир, кровоточащий огнем, но так много пищи для размышлений".

traits.locale_text: "It's... beautiful. There are ardent views in the void the likes of which I could never have imagined. A single vivid world bleeding with flames, yet so much substance for my thoughts."
traits.speaker: KibellahCompanion

languages.text: "Das ist ... wunderschön. In der Leere gibt es herrliche Ausblicke, die ich mir nie hätte vorstellen können. Eine einzige lebendige Welt, die Flammen blutet und doch so viel Substanz für meine Gedanken."
languages.original_text: "It's... beautiful. There are ardent views in the void the likes of which I could never have imagined. A single vivid world bleeding flames, yet so much substance for my thoughts."

traits.locale_text: "Das ist ... wunderschön. In der Leere gibt es herrliche Ausblicke, die ich mir nie hätte vorstellen können. Eine einzige lebendige Welt, die Flammen blutet und doch so viel Substanz für meine Gedanken."
traits.speaker: KibellahCompanion

languages.text: « C'est... magnifique. Il y a dans le vide des paysages si ardents que cela dépasse l'entendement. Ce seul monde isolé, dont s'épanchent des torrents de feu, me donne matière à réfléchir. »
languages.original_text: "It's... beautiful. There are ardent views in the void the likes of which I could never have imagined. A single vivid world bleeding flames, yet so much substance for my thoughts."

traits.locale_text: « C'est... magnifique. Il y a dans le vide des paysages si ardents que cela dépasse l'entendement. Ce seul monde isolé, dont s'épanchent des torrents de feu, me donne matière à réfléchir. »
traits.speaker: KibellahCompanion

languages.text: «Es... precioso. El vacío guarda imágenes que nunca podría imaginar. Un solo mundo que sangra fuego... Se me llena la cabeza de ideas».
languages.original_text: "It's... beautiful. There are ardent views in the void the likes of which I could never have imagined. A single vivid world bleeding flames, yet so much substance for my thoughts."

traits.locale_text: «Es... precioso. El vacío guarda imágenes que nunca podría imaginar. Un solo mundo que sangra fuego... Se me llena la cabeza de ideas».
traits.speaker: KibellahCompanion

languages.text: 「なんて…美しいの。想像したこともなかった激しい景色が虚空に広がっている。炎が吹き荒れている生々しい世界でありながら、私の思考には数多の実体が存在しているわ」
languages.original_text: "It's... beautiful. There are ardent views in the void the likes of which I could never have imagined. A single vivid world bleeding flames, yet so much substance for my thoughts."

traits.locale_text: 「なんて…美しいの。想像したこともなかった激しい景色が虚空に広がっている。炎が吹き荒れている生々しい世界でありながら、私の思考には数多の実体が存在しているわ」
traits.speaker: KibellahCompanion

languages.text: “这实在是……太美了，我根本想象不到，虚空之中居然会有如此炽热的景象。这个鲜活的世界流淌着火焰，为我的思想提供了充足的养分。”
languages.original_text: "It's... beautiful. There are ardent views in the void the likes of which I could never have imagined. A single vivid world bleeding flames, yet so much substance for my thoughts."

traits.locale_text: “这实在是……太美了，我根本想象不到，虚空之中居然会有如此炽热的景象。这个鲜活的世界流淌着火焰，为我的思想提供了充足的养分。”
traits.speaker: KibellahCompanion

languages.text: "Çok güzel... Uçsuz; hayalimden bile geçmemiş, ışıl ışıl manzaralarla dolu. Yalnızca damarlarından alevler akan, parlak bir dünya olsa da düşüncelerim için büyük bir besin kaynağı."
languages.original_text: "It's... beautiful. There are ardent views in the void the likes of which I could never have imagined. A single vivid world bleeding flames, yet so much substance for my thoughts."
